subtitle: Smoking is bad for you and your baby
description: Smoking is bad for you and your baby
title: Stop smoking
content:
Created by BabyCenter

Try to stop smoking, it will make you and your baby more healthy, and it will save you money! You could try to save your money to help pay for things you and your baby might need.

Smoking when you are pregnant can make your baby weak and sickly. It is also bad for your baby when you are breastfeeding. 

You could ask your family to help you to stop smoking. You might let them know that smoke in the house is also bad for the baby. Maybe you could ask them to stop with you. You could ask anyone who smokes in the house to smoke outside, now you are pregnant. 

If you smoke, start cutting down or quit. It will be difficult, but it is definitely worth it for your baby. Start by cutting down small amounts every day. If you are finding it really hard to cut down, talk to your health worker.
